Articles.Content:
Hi everybody,

 

My game crash more often due to a large amount of mods and and old laptop originaly made for an office role (graph card is not even able to support a sim like Il-2 1946...), so I use to have a large collection of output_logs in my crash folder and until yesterday my record holder for the last seven months was a 22 mb log, but then after a three hours play without any problems another CTD happen and this time the log weighs 68.127 mb, such a big jump forward!

So I was curious if some of you got even heavier reports ?
